name: Dig This 2
description:
Dig This 2 is the sequel to the hit game Dig This. Use your finger to guide the ball to the cup by creating a path in the sand. Dig This 2 has new powerups, characters and much more. Start digging today!
Features:
• Inventive and unique gameplay.
• Easy to understand.
• Realistic Physics.
• Encourages logical thinking and creativity.
• Discover new features like Antigravity and Breakable walls
• 3D-graphics.
• Solutions are available, if you get stuck.
